entry.value: select headline as headline, snippet as snippet, byline as byline, news_desk as news_desk, article_evaluation.web_url as URL, article_stats.views as current_views, round(article_popularity_prediction.prediction) as estimated_views, round(article_evaluation.openness_to_experience,2) as openness_to_experience, round(article_evaluation.conscientiousness,2) as conscientiousness, round(article_evaluation.extraversion,2) as extraversion, round(article_evaluation.agreeableness,2) as agreeableness, round(article_evaluation.emotional_stability,2) as emotional_stability, REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(article_popularity_prediction.web_url, '/', ''), ':', '') as id from article_evaluation, article_stats, article_popularity_prediction where article_evaluation.web_url = article_stats.web_url and article_popularity_prediction.web_url = article_stats.web_url limit 100
select sum(article_stats.views) as total_views from article_stats
select count(distinct byline) as bylines from article_evaluation
select count(distinct news_desk) as news_desks from article_evaluation
select count(*) as total from article_evaluation

select article_evaluation.news_desk as news_desk, SUM(article_stats.views) as total_views from article_evaluation, article_stats where article_evaluation.web_url = article_stats.web_url group by news_desk order by total_views desc limit 7

select trunc(article_evaluation.pub_date,'DAY') as pub_date_trunc, SUM(article_stats.views) as total_views from article_evaluation, article_stats where article_evaluation.web_url = article_stats.web_url group by pub_date_trunc order by pub_date_trunc desc limit 10
